languages.text:
Deals <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicts +6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, –1 stack of disturbed is removed every round.
Additionally, this grenade reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack.
languages.original_text:
Наносит <u>(от 8 до 10)</u> психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и накладывает +6 уровней {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g}. Начиная со следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} каждый раунд 1 уровень тревожности снимается.
Также эта граната понижает {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} цели на −1 до конца боя. Этот эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text:
Deals 8-10 Mental damage within the area and inflicts 3 stacks of disturbed effect on targets.
Every next round one stack of this disturbed effect is removed.

Deals <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicts +6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, –1 stack of disturbed is removed every round.
Additionally, this grenade reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack.

Deals <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicts +6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, –1 stack of disturbed is removed every round.
Additionally, this grenade reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack.

Targets in a 1-cell radius suffer <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain 6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, 1 stack of disturbed is removed every round. Also, the grenade decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack and affects the target even if they {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade.

languages.text:
Наносит <u>(от 8 до 10)</u> психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и накладывает +6 уровней {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g}. Начиная со следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} каждый раунд 1 уровень тревожности снимается.
Также эта граната понижает {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} цели на −1 до конца боя. Этот эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text:
Наносит <u>(от 8 до 10)</u> психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и накладывает +6 уровней {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g}. Начиная со следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} каждый раунд 1 уровень тревожности снимается.
Также эта граната понижает {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} цели на −1 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

Наносит 8–10 психического урона по области и накладывает на цели 3 уровня эффекта "тревожность".
В каждом следующем раунде 1 уровень эффекта снимается.

Наносит <u>(от 8 до 10)</u> психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и накладывает +6 уровней {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g}. Начиная со следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} каждый раунд 1 уровень тревожности снимается.
Также эта граната понижает {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} цели на −1 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text:
造成<u>8-10</u>点精神{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并对所有目标施加6层{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}效果。在接下来的每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，移除1层“惊扰”效果。
此外，此手雷会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}降低1级。此效果不会叠加，会持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
Deals <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicts +6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, –1 stack of disturbed is removed every round.
Additionally, this grenade reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
造成<u>8-10</u>点精神{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并对所有目标施加6层{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}效果。在接下来的每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，移除1层“惊扰”效果。
此外，此手雷会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}降低1级。此效果不会叠加，会持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
Inflige <u>(de 8 a 10)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} mental e inflige +6 acumulaciones del efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}. Desde el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, se elimina –1 acumulación de perturbado cada asalto.
Además, esta granada reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del objetivo en −1 hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text:
Deals <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicts +6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, –1 stack of disturbed is removed every round.
Additionally, this grenade reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
Inflige <u>(de 8 a 10)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} mental e inflige +6 acumulaciones del efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}. Desde el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, se elimina –1 acumulación de perturbado cada asalto.
Además, esta granada reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del objetivo en −1 hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text:
<u>（8～10）</u>の精神的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、+6スタック分の{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}効果を付与する。次の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}以降、ラウンドごとに-1スタックの動揺が取り除かれる。
さらに、このグレネードは戦闘が終了するまで、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}を-1減少させる。この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text:
Deals <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicts +6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, –1 stack of disturbed is removed every round.
Additionally, this grenade reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
<u>（8～10）</u>の精神的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、+6スタック分の{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}効果を付与する。次の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}以降、ラウンドごとに-1スタックの動揺が取り除かれる。
さらに、このグレネードは戦闘が終了するまで、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}を-1減少させる。この効果はスタックしない。

languages.text:
Verursacht <u>(8 bis 10)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Mentalschaden{/g} und bewirkt +6 Stapel des {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g}-Effektes. Ab der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} wird in jeder Runde -1 Stapel "Verstört" entfernt.
Darüber hinaus senkt diese Granate den {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −1. Dieser Effekt ist nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text:
Deals <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicts +6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, –1 stack of disturbed is removed every round.
Additionally, this grenade reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
Verursacht <u>(8 bis 10)</u> Mental{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}schaden{/g} und bewirkt +6 Stapel des {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g}-Effektes. Ab der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} wird in jeder Runde -1 Stapel "Verstört" entfernt.
Darüber hinaus senkt diese Granate den {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um -1. Dieser Effekt ist nicht stapelbar.

languages.text:
Inflige <u>(entre 8 et 10)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} mentaux et applique +6 cumuls de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}. À partir du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, 1 cumul de Perturbation est dissipé à chaque round.
De plus, la grenade réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de la cible de −1 jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable.

languages.text:
<u>(8 ila 10)</u> zihinsel {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ve +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}kaygı{/g} etkisi birikimine sebep olur. Bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunttan{/g} başlayarak her rauntta 1 kaygı etkisi birikimi ortadan kalkar.
Bomba ayrıca hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesini{/g} 1 puan azaltır. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bu etki, üst üste birikmez.
